abilities.name: BLOOD TIES
abilities.description: You do not have to spend influence to remove the custodians token from Mecatol Rex.

abilities.name: RECLAMATION
abilities.description: After you resolve a tactical action during which you gained control of Mecatol Rex, you may place 1 PDS and 1 space dock from your reinforcements on Mecatol Rex.

flagship.name: Salai Sai Corian
abilities: When this unit makes a combat roll, it rolls a number of dice equal to the number of your opponent's non-fighter ships in this system.

base.name: Acquiescence
base.effect: At the end of the strategy phase: Exchange 1 of your strategy cards with a strategy card that was chosen by the Winnu player.
base.returnCondition: Then, return this card to the Winnu player.

omega.name: Acquiescence
omega.effect: When the Winnu player resolves a strategic action: You do not have to spend or place a command token to resolve the secondary ability of that strategy card
omega.returnCondition: Then, return this card to the Winnu player

base.name: Berekar Berekon
base.ability: When 1 or more of a player's units use PRODUCTION: You may exhaust this card to reduce the combined cost of the produced units by 2.

base.name: Rickar Rickani
base.unlockCondition: Control Mecatol Rex or enter into a combat in the Mecatol Rex system
base.ability: During combat: Apply +2 to the result of each of your unit's combat rolls in the Mecatol Rex system, your home system, and each system that contains a legendary planet.

base.name: Mathis Mathinus
base.ability: ACTION: Perform the primary ability of any strategy card. Then, choose any number of other players. Those players may perform the secondary ability of that strategy card. Then, purge this card.
